channel.title: Error in npcdrops.cfg
channel.description:
[b]UPDATE: I TRIED TO CHANGE THE ITEMS MY OTHER NPCS DROP IN NPCDROPS.CFG BUT THEY JUST KEEP DROPPING WHAT THE ALWAYS HAVE[/b]
alright so i made a new npc (resized a dragon and made it huge) and its basicly a boss npc and i call it the customs protector dragon and it is supose to drop customs after u kill him i don't use delta or anything like that i just made my server from a blank source however my npcdrops are located in ./npcdrops.cfg (. stands for the server location) and i added the drops to npcdrops.cfg
[code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 1320 3 1037 1 995 1 560 1 6099 1 npcdrop = 98 3 4087 1 15352 1 3140 1 1187 1 <<< this one is the dragon (those items are the items a kdb drops i used it for testing)[/code]
and basicly it does nothing when i kill the npc it drops nothing
DOES ANYONE HAVE SOME ADVICE PLEASE
heres a pic
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/Capture.png[/img]

item.title: Error in npcdrops.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

ik its a epic fail ^[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:1, topic:314368”][quote author=Ahyo link=topic=410827.msg3030306#msg3030306 date=1258322197]
idk im not good with coding but its sumthing like

“3101 28 , 995 999999999 ,” ect

^how its set up for most NPC’s , 3101 = dragon claws. 995 = gp
[/quote]nope its like that my kbd uses that method and it works for him[/quote]

o then idk dude, i used that for KQ and Bandos because KBD is a biotch to kill on my server, it has 11k hp and when u kill it u only get 2 d claws.

Read full topic

alright so i made a new npc (resized a dragon and made it huge) and its basicly a boss npc and i call it the customs protector dragon and it is supose to drop customs after u kill him i don’t use delta or anything like that i just made my server from a blank source however my npcdrops are located in ./npcdrops.cfg (. stands for the server location) and i added the drops to npcdrops.cfg
